name: MONSTRA DEI: THE STRONGEST ASCENSION SYSTEM
name_original: MONSTRA DEI: THE STRONGEST ASCENSION SYSTEM
description: You find yourself stranded in a dungeon, the darkness envelops your body as your food supply runs out, and slowly close your eyes. But it was not in vain, the darkness of your eyelids turn to a pure white light, as seen in the heavens, the world glows around you as you revel in your newfound strength, now in the deepest depths of your soul, it awakens: THE STRONGEST ASCENSION SYSTEM IS NOW ONLINE; OBJECTIVE: reach level 100
